How is an arrangement and enrolment re-e.answer: Child Care Subsidy can only be paid to your child care provider if you have confirmed your child's enrolment details. To do this you need to log in to your Centrelink online account through myGov. To check your enrolment details has been updated, click the menu and go to Child Care Subsidy and then Enrolments.

Do Centrelink back pay child care subsid.answer: Under the Child Care Subsidy families are allowed 42 absence days per child, per financial year. These 42 allowable absences can be taken for any reason, including public holidays and when children are sick, without the need for families to provide documentation.
